name: Chicken Cannon
description:
Fill the cannon with powder, adjust the angle, prepare those wings and ... shoot!

In Chicken Cannon you will fly through the air to save the future of the corral.

Unlock powerful cannons and collect coins to upgrade your flying skills, equip helmets that suit your play style.
This chicken is determined to destroy the factory where her friends are locked up.
Will you help her do it?

Start playing Chicken Cannon and become the greatest flyer of the world!
Complete all missions to earn extra coins.
Fly through amazing places.
Adjust the power and direction of your cannon to launch the chicken as far as you can.
Don't forget to flap your wings and bounce off the animals.
Take advantage of everything you find on your way!

HIGHLIGHTS
• Attractive hand-drawn graphics.
• Simple but addictive arcade game.
• Simple controls.
• More than 150 missions to complete.
• World ranking of best flyers.
• Quick and fun games.

IT'S TIME TO FLY!
